text:
I'm running Win XP Pro, but this problem also occurred on Win 2000 AS. I have the latest version of MSI. This problem affects all recent MSI builds.

When I try to uninstall Apache (for example, to install a new version), MSI asks for the original installation package. (I don't know much about MSI, but normal Windows programs don't need this--perhaps they save uninstallation information in a small MSI package somewhere?)

If I weren't used to this problem, this would be a severe issue, because old versions of the MSI builds aren't available on the mirrors anywhere. I suppose a simple but ugly solution would be to keep all the old MSI builds around on the mirrors, but this just takes up space.
creator: apache-bugzilla@omershenker.net

text: If this is still an issue with recent versions, please re-open the bug.
creator: davi@apache.org
